body_html:
I tried not to install gcc using conda , but running python setup.py install it gives this error .
My gcc version is gcc (Alpine 6.2.1) 6.2.1 20160822
cmake: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

body:
I tried not to install gcc using conda , but running `python setup.py install` it gives this error .
My gcc version is gcc (Alpine 6.2.1) 6.2.1 20160822
cmake: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
